top_questions.text: List all the string library function(s) from the program.​

Read the program given below and answer the questions that follows. [2] DECLARE FUNCTION RETURNS(A$)​ LINE INPUT "Enter a Sentence"; S$​ PRINT RETURN$(S$)​ END FUNCTION RETURNS(A$)​ FOR T=1 TO LEN(A$)​ E$= MID$(A$,T,1)​ IF E$ SPACE$(1) THEN​ R$=E$+R$​ END IF​ NEXT T​ RETURN$=R$​ END FUNCTION Questions:
Using C language, write a program to input three integers then display the highest integer. [4] OR Using C language, write a program to display all even numbers from 20 to 40 along with their sum.
What do you mean by digital footprint? List any two ways to maintain our digital reputation.​
Write the technical term for the following statements. [2×1=2]
